data.text:
-> HTET 2024 Validity will be lifelong. The validity of certificates for passing the STET and Haryana TET has been extended indefinitely.

-> Earlier, the HTET Additional Result was declared and the result of Level-1, 2 and 3 of Haryana Teacher Eligibility Test- 2023 conducted on 02.12.2023 and 03.12.2023 was declared on 18.12.2023.

-> The Board of Secondary Education Haryana (BSEH) will be officially releasing the detailed HTET Exam 2024 Notification for various PRT, TGT, and PGT disciplines.

-> Candidates applied online from 30th October to 11th November 2023. The HTET Exam Dates 2024 for PGT (Level-3), TGT (Level-2) and PRT (Level-1) will be announced in the official notification.

-> The Haryana Teacher Eligibility Test (HTET) is conducted by the Board of School Education, Haryana to determine the eligibility of candidates for PGT and TGT posts in Government schools across Haryana.
